about_the_game:
🚪 The Elevator | Beyond The Doors – A Journey of Reflection and Choices

You step into an elevator. But this isn’t just an ordinary ride.
Each floor unveils a memory from your past, a forgotten regret, or a truth you’ve been avoiding.
There’s nowhere to escape. You must face it. But every confrontation leads to a different ending.

The Elevator is an emotional, psychological, and story-driven Visual Novel. Your character must confront their past, and every decision they make will shape the course of the story.

💭 Do your regrets define you? Or is change still possible?
🔀 Will your choices help you make peace with your past, or push you deeper into emptiness?
🔄 Can you still change everything?

Only you can decide.

🎭 A Deeply Story-Driven Experience with Multiple Endings

✔ A Powerful Narrative – Explore five different floors, each representing a pivotal emotional memory.
✔ Multiple Endings – Your decisions shape your fate, leading to vastly different conclusions.
✔ A Thought-Provoking Experience – Feel the weight of emotions as you navigate between regret, longing, fear, and hope.
✔ Immersive Visuals & Sound Design – A mysterious atmosphere and emotional soundscape bring the story to life.
✔ A Time Loop Narrative – You won’t just watch your past—you’ll have to face it.

📌 The Consequences of Your Choices

  • Can you reconcile with your past and build a fulfilling life, or will you remain trapped in regret?

  • What happens when you prioritize relationships and family over personal ambition?

  • Success or solitude? Will your career-driven mindset isolate you?

  • Is happiness truly something you can choose?

The answers lie in the choices you make.

🎬 Who Is This Game For?

🎮 Players who enjoy deep, emotional, and psychological stories.
🎮 Fans of narrative-driven games where choices truly matter.
🎮 Those intrigued by themes of mystery, psychology, and time loops.
🎮 Players who appreciate atmospheric, slow-paced, and introspective narratives.

In The Elevator, every time the doors open, you’ll confront a part of your past.
Where will this journey take you?

🚪 The doors are opening. The choice is yours.
